thenRoutine.Note: If the guess is correct, then click the button that displays the letters.

elseRoutine.Note: If the guess is not correct, then click the button that builds the image and checks for the game being over.

clickRoutine.Note: This checks the entire guess to see if it is correct and then sets color to green.
If the game is over, sets the colors to red.

info.name: Hangman
info.attribution:
The room design, library image, and all game elements (except for the chat system) are by LawDawg96 and are released to the Public Domain by CC0.

The chat system and an explanation of how to include it in any room are on the GitHub wiki.

--

The room design, library image, and all game elements (except for the chat system) are by LawDawg96 and are released to the Public Domain by CC0.  Portuguese word list provided by RaphaelAlvez.

The chat system and an explanation of how to include it in any room are on the GitHub wiki.
info.description: Guess letters to complete a word before the hangman image is filled in.

fields.text: The other players cannot see what you are typing. The word you enter will automatically be converted to all caps. Words should be 3 - 15 letters long. Spaces are not allowed.

qdzl.text: For multi-player version, one player types in a word for others to guess. Only this player will see the word as it is typed. To play again, the person who presses the reset button will enter the word.

chatRoutine.Note: Set parent, position, and owner of chat box
Set box to empty string to pre-populate it with something to make entry area full sized.
Get the current chat log string and put it into player log to erase the instructions.
Delete colored unicode buttons by using menu delete system
Set parent, position, and owner of option button.

openRoutine.Note: Check to see if playerName has an existing chat room.  If so, do nothing
If player doesn't have chat buttons, do thenRoutine.

thenRoutine.Note: Clone side button
Clone main chat log
Clone red unicode
Clone orange unicode
Clone yellow unicode
Clone green unicode
Clone blue unicode
Clone purple unicode
Clone brown unicode
Clone black unicode
Set position and owner of side button
Set parent, position, and owner of main chat log
Set instructions in chat log.
thenRoutine.value:
Welcome to VirtualTabletop Chat version 1.1. 

Only you can see this chat window.

Move it around by dragging the blue side button. Click the button to dock to nearest side (or push button towards any boundary).

When docked, button will turn red if you get a new message.

Open and close options menu by pressing blue option button that will appear at the bottom.

You can change colors and css settings there.

Chat stores last 5,000 characters.

Press 'Enter' key after typing message to send.

Post feedback in #general channel on Discord.

Choose color to start.

thenRoutine.Note: Set parent, position, and owner of red unicode.
Set parent, position, and owner of orange unicode.
Set parent, position, and owner of yellow unicode.
Set parent, position, and owner of green unicode.
Set parent, position, and owner of blue unicode.
Set parent, position, and owner of purple unicode.
Set parent, position, and owner of brown unicode.
Set parent, position, and owner of black unicode.

mainChat.css: background-color: #F0F0F0; color: black; font-size: 16px; text-align:left; line-height: 20px; padding: 0px 20px 0px 20px;  border-color: grey; border-style: dotted

changeRoutine.Note: Determine if user has pressed Enter key.
If user has pressed Enter, do the thenRoutine; otherwise do nothing.
thenRoutine: var myChat = ${myChat} replace '\u000a' '' // Erase the carriage return.

thenRoutine.Note: Get the current chat log string.

thenRoutine: var mainChat = ${myChat} concat ${mainChat} // Add the player's typed entry to the beginning of the string.

thenRoutine.Note: Get the user unicode color icon and attach it to the playerName

thenRoutine.note: Create temporary property to add colon to name.
Erase temporary property

thenRoutine: var mainChat = ${displayName} concat ${mainChat} // Create a string with the display name and the new chat log string.
var mainChat = '\u000a\u000a' concat ${mainChat} // Add a blank line at the top of the chat log.

thenRoutine.Note: Select the main chat log and put the chat string into it.
Select the cloned main chat logs and put the chat string into it.
Erase the text in the chat box.
If menu is open, then delete all menu cloned buttons.
Change the menustatus flag to false so the next click will recreate the menu.

elseRoutine.Note: If menu is not open, then clone the menu items by doing the elseRoutine.
Call the functions to create the menu basics, the css input labels and the unicode color buttons.
Change menustatus flag so next click will close menu.
Get size property and call the half or full height routine to set the location of the widgets.

colorCloneRoutine.Note: Each of the following segments will clone the respective color unicode button and then set the layer, parent and owner of the buttons as a group

colorCloneRoutine.NOTE: Set parent, layer, and owner of all unicode buttons

cssCloneRoutine.Note: Each of the following segments will clone the respective css options label and then set the parent and owner of the labels as a group
Set layer, parent and owner of all css labels

menuCloneDeleteRoutine.Note: Delete menu holder and css options.

optionsBasicsRoutine.Note: Set parent, position, and owner of menu holder
Set parent, position, and owner of menu text

FullHeightRoutine.Note: Set height of main chat log.
Set height and location of typing area.
The height change only displays if the mainChat is updated.  Call routine to make that happen.

HalfHeightRoutine.Note: Set height of main chat log.
Set height and location of typing area.
The height change only displays if the mainChat is updated.  Call routine to make that happen.

forceChangeRoutine.Note: Get the current chat log string.
The chat log must change to something, so erase it and then put the originial right back in.
Repeat the same process, but this time for the typing area.
The chat log must change to something, so erase it and then put the originial right back in.
